text.__SUMMARY__: The Puerto Rican flower bat (Phyllonycteris major) is an extinct species of bat from the family Phyllostomidae (leaf-nosed bats). It was endemic to Puerto Rico and is known only from subfossil skeletal material.
text.Sources:
UNEP-WCMC Species Database
Bucknell University - Wilson & Reeder's: Mammal Species of the World (Third edition)
ZipCodeZoo.com
